name: All-around Chatango fix.
description:
An all-around fix for Chatango inspired by different peoples codes and a personal need for a better looking design.

Credit for the font goes to h-ibaldo
Font: https://h-ibaldo.github.io/Raleway_Fixed_Numerals/

Credits:
"Bretty good simple" - By Cowwwww
"Stretched Profile" - By VII-Encoding
"Chatango Annoyance Fix" - By Shikaku2


"All around Chatango fix" - By Me of course :)



Disclaimer: Style only applies to Chats, Browser changes not included.
additional_info:
• Changed font to Rawline(Raleway)
  • Added round pictures(will put the option for squared soon)
  • Added "anti flood" (Making it so a message cant be more than 10 lines, will make an option to disable this)
  • Will now make "Filtered messages" invisible
  • Added comments for help with removing code. (Wanted by a friend)
  • Will now capitalize the first letter in a message
  • Your input window now shows the font and bg you are using.
  • Pictures are slightly larger with this Style.
  • Underlining, Italics and Bold fonts styles are no longer displayed.
  • All account names are now capitalized.
  • IPs are no longer visable.
